alert.note: Alert for Central Arctic Plains; Central Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 20 at 1:06AM AKDT until October 21 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM EARLY THIS MORNING TO 4 PM AKDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting to 35 mph. * WHERE...Central Arctic Plains and Central Brooks Range. * WHEN...From 4 AM Friday to 4 PM AKDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Strong winds and blowing snow will decrease to visibility to half mile or less. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northwest winds increasing to 35 mph this morning will cause reduced visibility in snow and blow snow. Winds and snow will continue into Saturday and then decrease late Saturday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Arctic Plains; Central Brooks Range
